[center][color=red][size=150]Book Description[/color][/size][/center]

[center][color=blue] The Eidolon is an adventure about people from all over the world who come together to journey into outer-space aboard The Eidolon Spaceship! The spaceship is designed to hold 64 passengers, and 8 crew members. The 64 passengers are all winners of a great, worldwide space lottery held by eccentric trillionaire and creator of the Eidolon Spaceship, Mr. Cheung! Each one of these people has their own special story, such as Karrie, who loses her Husband in a bank robbery shooting, or Abdu, who discovers his Brother is gay, or Melvyn, who is haunted by the memory of his dead wife and daughter, who he accidentally electrocuted years ago, and many, many more! They will all find themselves aboard the Eidolon Spaceship, but little do they know of the adventures that await!..[/color][/center]
